    • Field Detail

      • MAX_DUPLICATES

        protected static int MAX_DUPLICATES
        Maximum number of consecutive duplicate result records we'll accept before disabling the duplicate record check for the current search. The idea is to avoid displaying occasional duplicates, but don't discard forever in the pathological case where we're only getting duplicate results.
